name: @pawjs/less
description: Add Sass support to your project

scripts.start: npm run build && babel src --out-dir lib --source-maps --presets=env,react --plugins=transform-object-rest-spread --watch
scripts.build: rimraf lib && babel src --out-dir lib --presets=env,react --plugins=transform-object-rest-spread  && cpr package.json lib/package.json && cpr README.md lib/README.md
scripts.npm-publish: npm version patch && npm run build && cd lib && npm publish --access=public --tag=latest && cd ..

author: Atyantik Technologies Private Limited <tirthbodawala@atyantik.com>
